external_games.name: Skate the Line and Rail Grind

name: Skate the Line and Rail Grind
summary: Skate the line while getting points from picking up diamonds and grinding on the rails but avoid the spikes. Use the diamonds you collect to buy other skate characters, themes and skateboards. Use the right arrow button to move forward, the up arrow button to jump and the skateboard icon button to level out the skateboard.
